TEXT.FORM: tɕhɯŋkhɤr ɯχpi tuβzuj qhe nɯnɯ ra li kɯ-fsɯ-fse tuβzuj pɯɕti tɕendɤre iɕqha li ndʑu chɯphaʁi ndʑu nɯ chɯ́wɣphaʁ qhe, kɯki fse kɯβde jamar, kɯki kɯfse kɤlɯlju, kutɕu tɕi chɯphaʁi, kutɕu tɕi chɯphaʁi qhe tɕe nɯnɯ ɯŋgɯ ri tɤrɤm ɯɲtɕhɯr chɯ-rku-j tɕe kutɕu ki ci tu-stu-j kutɕu ki ci tu-stu-j tɕe kɯβde kɯtu nɯnɯ, ki tustuj tɕe, nɯre chɯrku-j tɕe kuxtɕɤri kuxtɕɤri tɕe tɕendɤre tɯci ɯthɤcu ri nɯ kɯfse ɯtaʁ nɯ cɯpɤspoʁspoʁ pjɯ-βzu-j (pjɯ́wɣʁre) cɯpɤspoʁspoʁ pjɯ-ta-j tɕe tɕendɤre maŋpa nɯ βɣɤno, maŋtaʁ nɯ βɣɤtu ɯɕpɯz tɕe βɣɤsni kɯtu, kutɕu ri tu-sɯrʁe-j tɕe tɕendɤre tɯci ɯthɤcu ri lúwɣɕthɯz tɕe tɕendɤre ɯpa ɯtɕhɯŋkhɤr nɯ chɯsɯmtɕɯr tɕe, ɯtaʁ cɯpɤspoʁspoʁ nɯ kusɯmtɕɯr tɕe nɯ tɯjaʁ kɤlɤt mɤkɯra tɯci kɯ chɯsɯmtɕɯr pɯŋgrɤl nɯnɯ li jikɯmtɕhɯ tunɯβzuj pɯŋgrɤl
